member.name: M:AdaptiveVision.IPICodeMacrofilters.SavePoints(AvlNet.Point3D[],System.String)
member.summary: Executes a single 'SavePoints' macrofilter iteration and returns true if there are still some iterations available and false otherwise.

member.name: M:AdaptiveVision.IPICodeMacrofilters.Exit

member.name: M:AdaptiveVision.IPICodeMacrofilters.Create(System.String)
member.summary: Creates and initializes a .NET Macrofilter interface
member.param: A path to the Adaptive Vision Project or Program. Supported formats are: *.avproj, *.avcode and *.avlib.
